first_translate: then...
does that mean you won’t get engaged?
get engaged...?
I guess so. people usually do before they marry each other...
I guess so. people usually do before they marry each other...
maybe I’ll have to think about this now...

hangle: 피오나 영애는 늘 여러 의미로 느긋하네요….
first_translate: lady fiona always seems laid-back in many ways...
until recently, she was still deciding whether or not to break up with him!
well, there’s no need to rush anything.
and I’m also unsure if even siegren has marriage on his mind right now...
not to mention, abel hasn’t come back yet either.

hangle: ‘저희 약혼할게요!’ 하면 무슨 반응이 나올지도 모르겠고.
first_translate: if we tell everyone “we’re getting married!” without discussing things first, who knows how he might react?
siegren forbidden from entering after 8 p.m.
it looks like my time here is almost over.
I’d better head home.
why does he follow these rules so diligently?!
the ones about being out by eight o’clock!!
is he some kind of middle schooler?!
but when I really think about it,
when siegren and I get married...
that would make her...
your mother-in-law.
what are you thinking about?
a peaceful life among the nobility where neither the crown prince nor the empress exist anymore...
oh...
first off, I should ask siegren what he thinks about all this...
this gives me something new to worry about.
no, nothing at all.
huh?
cain ereze is flustered,

hangle: 그 앞에 선 건 대여섯 살은 차이 날 10대 후반의 소녀…
first_translate: while standing opposite him is a girl probably around ten years younger than him...
who could she be?
at one glance, I can see that she isn’t just anyone ordinary.
nor is she any noble lady whose face I recognize.
wait a minute...
do you think she's someone he used to date?
if that were actually true, burying them both alive...
...would be good riddance.
y-your highness...!

hangle: 이제 훈련 시간이다. 뭘 하고 있지?
first_translate: my training session starts soon! why haven’t you left yet?
judging by their reactions, maybe it’s true.
can I say...
“nice meeting you”?
good morning,
brother.
I am the first imperial princess.
you may call me aria.
“brother?”
right.
even though I’ve never seen her before,
she wasn’t born into the direct line of succession.

hangle: 하급 귀족 출신 황비의 소생이라 했던가.
first_translate: I believe she was the daughter of a low-ranking noblewoman.
oops!
forgive me for interrupting your morning training, brother.

hangle: 예전 제 기사였던 케인 경과 이야기를 나누고 싶어서요.
first_translate: I wanted to talk with sir cain, since he used to serve as my knight.
ah.
take him then, but only briefly.

hangle: 케인은 황녀 궁의 기사였으니 주종 관계였군.
first_translate: so cain served under the first imperial princess.

hangle: 케인이 아비인 에레즈 후작의 수족 노릇을 하지 않는다더니.
first_translate: I heard he didn’t work directly under his father, marquis ereze.
y-your highness...
perhaps that explains everything.
either way, I don’t care much about half-siblings.

hangle: 어머니 외의 혈연은 없는 것과 마찬가지니까.
first_translate: to me, blood relatives outside of our mother aren’t worth considering anyway.

hangle: 하지만 나와 황태자, 어느 쪽의 편에도 아직 서지 않고
first_translate: but if house ereze’s eldest son, who refuses to take sides between myself and the crown prince,

hangle: 모호한 태도를 고수하는 에레즈의 장자가 끼어있다면…
first_translate: has been maintaining such ambiguous behavior until now...
they must've found out already.
a sister?
yes, apparently I had a stepsister.

hangle: 원작에서는 제대로 등장한 장면도 없던 존재였는데.
first_translate: in the original story, she barely made an appearance.

hangle: 몸이 약하다며 나오지 않아 얼굴도 본적 없었는데.
first_translate: since she said she was sickly, she rarely came out of her room, which meant I hardly ever saw her too.
recently however, she started going out more often.
are you talking about the first imperial princess...?
then perhaps she recovered from her illness. thank goodness.

hangle: 글쎄, 처음부터 아픈 척을 했던 것일지도.
first_translate: well, it’s possible she pretended to be ill from the start.
the timing fits perfectly well.
as soon as the empress and crown prince stopped causing trouble, she began making public appearances again.
that means...
...she kept watching the empress closely.
of course.
or else she would’ve killed her long ago.

hangle: 의외로 이 황가에 직계 황족은 그리 많지 않았다.
first_translate: strangely enough, there weren’t very many members of the royal family within the palace walls.
usually, women died shortly after giving birth.

hangle: 여자가 살아 있는 경우가 거의 없어.
first_translate: usually, women died shortly after giving birth.

hangle: 황제가 손을 댄 여자와 그 아이를 처리한 것이다.
first_translate: the emperor got rid of every woman he slept with along with their children.

hangle: 하지만 황비는 어쨌든 하급이라고 해도 귀족이고,
first_translate: but although the late empress belonged to a lower rank, she was still part of the aristocracy.

hangle: 그렇다고 뒷배경은 없으니 살려 둔 모양이야.
first_translate: plus, she lacked connections, so he decided to spare her life instead.

hangle: 황자가 아닌 황녀였으니, 그냥 내버려 둔 거구나.
first_translate: since she gave birth to a princess rather than a prince, he simply ignored her afterward.

hangle: 게다가 납작 엎드려 있었다면 신경 쓸 가치도 없다 생각했겠지.
first_translate: on top of that, because she remained loyal to him, he thought she wasn’t worth paying attention to.
the first imperial princess appears smarter than expected.

hangle: 눈치도 있고, 자존심을 굽히고 기어야 할 때도 알고 있다.
first_translate: she knew exactly when to keep quiet and bow down to save herself.
so...

hangle: 새로운 세력 구도가 생겼다고 하는 거야?
first_translate: are you saying a new power dynamic emerged?
duke priscilla and marquess clovis.

hangle: 5 가문 중 중립을 지지하고 있는 귀족들이 수상해.
first_translate: out of the five families, those two houses support neutrality, which makes them suspicious.

hangle: …그러네, 두 가문의 수장은 무리하게 중립을 지키고 있지.
first_translate: true, the heads of those two households seem overly insistent on remaining impartial.

hangle: 원작의 아렌트는 유니스에게 빠져, 지금과는 행보가 전혀 달랐다.

if that assumption turns out to be correct,
we might need to nip this problem in the bud early on.

for now,
I wish to observe further.

alright, suit yourself.

hangle: 아마 너나 나나 권력에 미련이 없기 때문 아닐까.
first_translate: probably because neither of us cares about gaining power.
